abstract: The trade issue is important because Prime Minister Wen Jiabao of China has linked it to the question of whether the country would help bail out the European Union.
snippet: The trade issue is important because Prime Minister Wen Jiabao of China has linked it to the question of whether the country would help bail out the European Union.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — The European Union has stepped up discussions with Beijing on a potentially important change in China’s favor to trade rules covering China’s exports, but China still needs to curb subsidies to the nation’s exporters, a senior European official said here Thursday.

headline.main: Europe Steps Up Talks With China on Its Market Status
headline.print_headline: Europe and China Step Up Talks on Market Status
